analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0xc3b025d92b771f8e0b70111147d4d620278b6ad1.sol:
	Contract Uncloak has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0xc3b025d92b771f8e0b70111147d4d620278b6ad1.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0xc3b025d92b771f8e0b70111147d4d620278b6ad1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/21/0xc3b025d92b771f8e0b70111147d4d620278b6ad1.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/21/0xc3b025d92b771f8e0b70111147d4d620278b6ad1.sol#80) is not in mixedCase
